name: DeCompress
author: kim2091
description:
Purpose: JPEG (works on many compression formats)

USE 4x-UltraSharp INSTEAD - This is UniScaleV2, but intended for images with compression. Seems to work best on realistic images.
dataset: Custom Dataset consisting of lossless 4k frames from Metal Arms: Glitch in the System, Just Cause 3, Dirt 3, Forza Horizon 3, Sleeping Dogs, and self-edited photos from SignatureEdits + ATLA DVD images
